name: Harmutty STGFOP1 - Assam, Second Flush 2013
description:
A full-bodied and rich orthodox black tea from the Harmutty Estate in Assam, India. Many of the large leaves are golden in colour, indicating the high proportion of fine tips used in the manufacture of this delightful second flush tea. Smooth flavours of malt and creamy chocolate are noticeable, and there is little astringency, making this tea ideal for drinking without milk (although you can add some if you like!). The Harmutty Estate is Rainforest Alliance certified.

Ingredients: Black tea from Harmutty Estate, Assam, India.

To brew: Use one teaspoon per cup of boiling water and steep 3-5 minutes, strain and enjoy. A second infusion is possible with a shorter first brew. Add milk if desired.

Available in two sizes - 25 cups and 50 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Giddapahar SFTGFOP1 - Darjeeling, First Flush 2013
description:
A delicate and fragrant first flush tea (2013) from the small family-owned Giddapahar Estate in Darjeeling, India. Surprisingly 'green' tasting for a black tea, with floral and fruity notes and a soft, mild astringency. Best brewed with slightly-cooler-than-boiling water and served without milk.

Ingredients: Black tea from Giddapahar Estate, Darjeeling, India.

To brew: Use one teaspoon per cup of water. Boil water and allow to cool for 1-2 minutes before pouring over the tea leaves. Steep 2-3 minutes, strain and enjoy. A second infusion is usually possible.

Available in two sizes - 25 cups and 50 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Clarity Tea - visionary blend
description:
A unique blend, each herb has a long history of use to strengthen physical and/or inner sight. Choose Clarity Tea when you wish to see more clearly what is going on around you. This blend may also help to relieve symptoms of seasonal allergies such as watering, itchy eyes. Read more about it on our blog! http://lilithsherbgarden.wordpress.com/2013/07/31/clarity-tea-our-visionary-blend/

Not suitable during pregnancy or breastfeeding. Not suitable for children.

Ingredients: 100% Organic  fennel seeds (foeniculum vulgare), mugwort (artemisia vulgaris), calendula (calendula officinalis), eyebright (euphrasia officinalis).

To brew: use one teaspoon per cup of boiling water, steep 5-10 minutes, strain and enjoy.

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Qi Tonic Tea - for energy and wellness
description:
A delicious, earthy yet refreshing blend of herbs chosen for their antioxidant and tonic properties. This tea blend contains sencha, gotu kola, oatstraw and rosemary for energy, lemongrass for flavour, & goji berries, dandelion leaf, alfalfa herb and nettle leaf for deep nutrition. Qi Tonic is designed to support and nourish the body's systems over the long term.

Qi Tonic tea is ideal for steeping multiple times throughout the day. Put a couple of teaspoons into a pot or plunger and reinfuse as many times as you like - the flavours change with each infusion. You can also eat the goji berries at the end!  

Consult your health practitioner before use during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

Ingredients: Australian sencha green tea (camellia sinensis) and 100% organic: goji berries (lycium barbara), dandelion leaf (taraxacum officinale), gotu kola (centella asiatica), rosemary (rosmarinus officinalis), nettle leaf (urtica dioica), alfalfa (medicago sativa), oatstraw (avena sativa), lemongrass (cymbopogon citratus)

name: Goddess Garden Tea - Feminine nurturing blend
description:
A blend designed to connect you with the Divine Feminine within, whether you are female or male, with Mugwort for Her as Maiden, raspberry leaf for Her as Mother, dandelion root for Her as Crone, and roses to honour all Her aspects. 

Not suitable during pregnancy or breastfeeding. Not suitable for children.

Ingredients: 100% Organic. mugwort (artemisia vulgaris), raspberry leaf (rubus idaeus), dandelion root (taraxacum officinale), rose petals (rosa spp).

To brew: use one teaspoon per cup of boiling water, steep 10 minutes, strain and drink.

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Australian Green Tea - refreshing and mild
description:
Grown in the Victorian Alps and manufactured in the Japanese 'sencha' style, Australian Green Tea is refreshing with a good balance of astringency and sweetness. It has a moderate caffeine level and is rich in antioxidants.

Ingredients: Australian green tea (camellia sinensis)

To brew: use one teaspoon (approx. 2g) per cup. Bring fresh water to a boil and allow to cool for 2-3 minutes (to70-80ÂºC) before pouring over tea. Steep for 1-2 minutes according to taste. May be reinfused 2-3 times.

Available in two sizes - 25 cups and 50 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Love's Garden Tea - to nurture your heart
description:
A herbal blend designed to honour, nurture and strengthen the heart's energies on the physical and emotional levels. This tea will 'gladden your heart' if you feel discouraged or disheartened and will help open you to the flow of universal love that surrounds us.  

Not suitable during pregnancy or breastfeeding. Consult your doctor before using if you have a heart condition or take blood pressure medication.

Ingredients: 100% Organic. rose petals (rosa spp), hawthorn berries (crataegus oxycantha), lemon balm (melissa officinalis), rosemary (rosmarinus officinalis), motherwort (leonurus cardiaca, yarrow (achillea millefolium).

To brew: Use one teaspoon per cup of boiling water, steep 5-10 minutes, strain and enjoy.

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Mother's Garden Tea - nutritional and emotional support
description:
A blend of tonic and mineral-rich herbs, designed to nourish and support you in times of stress and high demand. Particularly beneficial for mothers, Mother's Garden Tea helps connect you with the all-embracing Mother of us all. A hug in a cup! 

Suitable for use during pregnancy and breastfeeding. Suitable for children.

Ingredients: 100% Organic. oatstraw (avena sativa), nettle leaf (urtica dioica), raspberry leaf (rubus idaeus).

To brew: use one teaspoon per cup of boiling water, steep 10 minutes, strain and enjoy.

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Fire Chai - stimulating blend with cinnamon, turmeric & ginger
description:
A powerfully warming blend of fiery spices and low-caffeine Daintree tea, Fire Chai will heat you through to your very toes! This chai is not for the faint of heart, and is best brewed with dairy or coconut milk to temper its strength. A great choice if you are coming down with a cold or suffering from poor circulation. Turmeric, cinnamon and ginger also bring their antioxidant and anti-inflammatory benefits to this delicious spicy tea. Read more about it on our blog! http://lilithsherbgarden.wordpress.com/2013/07/06/feeling-chilly-make-a-mug-of-fire-chai/

Ingredients: Pesticide-free Australian Daintree black tea (camellia sinensis), cinnamon (cinnamonum zeylanicum), ginger (zingiber officinalis), turmeric (curcuma longa), cayenne (capsicum annuum). All spices are organic.

To brew: Steep a level teaspoon (no more) per 1/2-1 cup of water for five minutes. Strain and add 1/2-1 cup warmed milk of choice, and sweeten to taste if desired. Fire up!

Available in two sizes - 25 cups and 50 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Green Garden Tea - To soothe your digestion
description:
A delicious combination of soothing herbs to help relieve bloating and settle digestive upsets. Green Garden Tea is particularly good for stress-related digestive issues and may help with symptoms of IBS. A gentle pleasant tasting remedy for children's tummy aches. 

Suitable during pregnancy and breast feeding, and for children.

Ingredients: 100% Organic. catnip (nepeta cataria), chamomile (anthemis nobilis), peppermint (mentha piperita), lemon balm (melissa officinalis).

To brew: use one teaspoon per cup of boiling water, steep 5 minutes, strain and enjoy.

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Moon Chai - gentle spices and vanilla
description:
A delicate, fragrant chai containing sweet vanilla, cinnamon and other mild spices blended with low-caffeine Daintree tea. Moon Chai can be enjoyed on its own or with the addition of your choice of milk and sweetener, and makes a delicious treat for adults and children alike. 

Ingredients: pestidide-free Australian Daintree black tea (camellia sinensis), cinnamon (cinnamonum zeylanicum), ginger (zingiber officinale), cardamom (elettaria cardamonum), cloves (szygium aromaticum), vanilla bean (vanilla planifolia), star anise (illicium verum). All spices except vanilla are 100% organic.

To brew: steep one teaspoon per 1/2 cup of boiling water for 5 minutes. Strain and add 1/2 cup of of warmed milk of choice. Sweeten to taste if desired, and enjoy.

Available in two sizes - 30 cups and 60 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Sacred Male Journey Tea - masculine nurturing blend
description:
A male counterpart to our Triple Goddess blend, Sacred Male Journey Tea honours the God within each of us. Tonic and earthy, but with enough fire to make it uplifting, this blend will help you connect with the wisdom of the Divine Masculine. Suitable for men and women, particularly those who are approaching or have passed menopause. 

Not suitable during pregnancy or breastfeeding. Not suitable for children.

Ingredients: 100% Organic. damiana (turners diffusa), sarsaparilla (smilax ornata), sage (salvia officinalis), yarrow (achillea millefolium).

To brew: Use one teaspoon per cup of boiling water, steep 10 minutes, strain and enjoy.

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Quiet Garden Tea - To Calm and Soothe
description:
A gentle yet effective nervine blend formulated to calm an overexcited nervous system. Take 2-3 cups daily for general anxiety, including one cup before bed if you are having trouble getting to sleep. Quiet Garden Tea may also be useful for the symptomatic relief of headaches. 

Not suitable during pregnancy and breastfeeding. Not suitable for children.

Ingredients: 100% Organic. chamomile (anthemis nobilis), lavender (lavandula officinalis), vervain (verbena officinalis), betony (stachys officinalis), lemon balm (melissa officinalis).

To brew: Use one teaspoon per cup of boiling water, steep 10 minutes, strain and enjoy.

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Dream Garden Tea - for peaceful clear dreams
description:
A blend designed to facilitate peaceful sleep and clear dreaming, opening you to the messages that the universe is waiting to send you. This gentle protective mix can also help prevent nightmares. 

Not suitable during pregnancy or breastfeeding. Not suitable for children.

Ingredients: 100% Organic. mugwort (artemisia vulgaris), lavender (lavandula officinalis), chamomile (anthemis nobilis), calendula (calendula officinalis), rose petals (rosa spp), betony (stachys officinalis), bay (lauris nobilis)

To brew: steep one teaspoon per cup of boiling water for ten minutes. Strain and drink. Best taken before bed.

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Healing Garden Tea - For Colds and Flu
description:
A combination of classic lymphatic, diaphoretic and astringent herbs to relieve the discomforts of colds and other upper respiratory infections. Best taken at the first signs of illness, to stimulate the body's defenses. If desired, add a pinch of cayenne or a tablespoon of grated ginger for extra oomph, and raw honey to soothe a sore throat. Read more about it on our blog! http://lilithsherbgarden.wordpress.com/2013/07/15/a-tried-and-true-remedy-for-colds-and-flu-healing-garden-tea/

Suitable during pregnancy and breastfeeding. Suitable for children.

Ingredients: 100% Organic. echinacea (echinacea purpurea), peppermint (mentha piperita), catnip (nepeta cataria), yarrow (alchemilla vulgaris), elderflower (sambucus nigra).

To brew: use one teaspoon per cup of boiling water, steep 5 minutes, strain and drink as hot as possible. Then wrap up warm to sweat things out, and rest!

Available in two sizes - 20 cups and 40 cups. Packaged in fully compostable, recycled paper bags (see second image for example).

name: Comfrey and Calendula Ointment
description:
A rich herbal-scented combination of two amazing healing plants, infused into olive oil and combined with beeswax to make an all-purpose ointment. A great addition to the first aid kit, Comfrey and Calendula Ointment is suitable for bumps, bruises, minor cuts and scrapes. 

Ingredients: organic comfrey leaf and flower (symphytum officinale), organic calendula (calendula officinalis), olive oil, beeswax.
